SELECT DISTINCT oo.order_sn, oo.create_time, oo.total_amount, oo.pay_amount, oo.order_type, usi.`name`, usi.id, usi.images, oo.order_status, usi.phone FROM oms_order oo INNER JOIN `ums_shop_information` usi ON oo.shop_id = usi.id WHERE oo.member_id =#{memberId}
and order_status =0
and order_status =1
and order_status =2
and order_status =3
and order_status =4
and order_status =5
AND 1 = 1
ORDER BY oo.create_time DESC
